about-text: Frontend Developer. My stack includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js
about-paragraph: I am a frontend developer specializing in building modern, scalable web applications. My stack includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js. I am constantly learning and strive to develop as a frontend developer.
web-development-desc: I build responsive and high-performance websites using modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Next.js. My approach focuses on clean code, user experience, and scalability — delivering solutions that help your business grow online.
ui-ux-design-desc: I create modern, intuitive, and visually appealing website designs focused on user experience and brand identity. My process includes designing user interfaces in Figma and Adobe XD, ensuring your site stands out and engages your audience from the first click.
freelancer-desc: As a freelancer, I provide flexible, client-oriented solutions to help businesses achieve their goals. I handle projects end-to-end — from concept and design to deployment. You can count on transparent communication, meeting deadlines, and top-quality results. Let’s bring your vision to life together!
sarah-comment: Somon delivered our frontend project ahead of schedule and with outstanding quality. His attention to UX and clean code made integration seamless for our team. Highly recommended!
david-comment: Working with Somon was effortless. He instantly understood my wireframes and brought them to life with perfect pixel implementation. A rare talent in frontend development.
laura-comment: Excellent communication, strong frontend skills and honest approach. Highly recommended.
nasim-comment: Somon wrote clean, modular code that was easy to integrate into our backend. His Git commits were organized and well-documented. A true professional!
farzona-comment: Somon built a beautiful landing page for our latest campaign. Fast, responsive, SEO-friendly — and exactly on brand. We’ll definitely work with him again.
jason-comment: He took our Figma designs and turned them into a live app in record time. His responsiveness and flexibility made him a favorite among our dev team.
isabella-comment: Somon brought our design vision to life with elegance and precision. His ability to translate creative ideas into responsive and fast-loading pages was truly impressive.
ethan-comment: I was impressed by his front-end development skills and structured code. He writes like an engineer but thinks like a designer - a rare combination that every team needs.
